text: Rúben Correia Alfaiate (born 17 August 1995) is a Portuguese footballer who plays for Clube Atlético de Molelos, as a goalkeeper. ==Football career== On 10 May 2015, Alfaiate made his professional debut with Oriental in a 2014–15 Segunda Liga match against Leixões. ==Personal== He is an identical twin brother of Alexandre Alfaiate. ==References== ==External links== * * *Stats and profile at LPFP *National team data *Rúben Alfaiate at ZeroZero Category:1995 births Category:People from Peniche, Portugal Category:Twin sportspeople Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Clube Oriental de Lisboa players Category:LigaPro players Category:Sport Benfica e Castelo Branco players Category:Portugal youth international footballers
title: Rúben Alfaiate
